profile.name: ElAmir
profile.title: Software Engineer · NLP Researcher · Instructional Designer
profile.tagline: Building agentic systems and applying NLP to mental health. 10+ years turning complex ideas into software, research, and courses that make a real difference.

planets.name: iOS Development
planets.description: Native iOS applications built with Swift and SwiftUI. Clean architecture, smooth animations, and pixel-perfect interfaces.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker Pro
projects.description: A health and fitness app with real-time workout tracking, custom routines, and HealthKit integration.
projects.architecture:
graph TD
A[SwiftUI Views] --> B[ViewModel]
B --> C[HealthKit API]
B --> D[CoreData]
C --> E[Health Store]
D --> F[Local Cache]

projects.title: Smart Notes
projects.description: An AI-powered note-taking app with natural language search and automatic categorization.

planets.name: Full-Stack Engineering
planets.description: End-to-end web applications. From databases to deployment, every layer built with purpose.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A scalable marketplace with real-time inventory, payment processing, and analytics dashboard.
projects.architecture:
graph TD
A[React Frontend] -->|REST API| B[Go Backend]
B --> C[PostgreSQL]
B --> D[Redis Cache]
A --> E[Stripe SDK]
B -->|Webhooks| E[Stripe]

projects.title: DevOps Dashboard
projects.description: Centralized monitoring tool for CI/CD pipelines, container health, and deployment metrics.
projects.architecture:
graph TD
A[Dashboard UI] --> B[WebSocket Server]
B --> C[Docker API]
B --> D[CI/CD Hooks]
C --> E[Container Metrics]
D --> F[Build Logs]

planets.name: E-Learning & Content
planets.description: Educational platforms and content systems that make complex topics accessible and engaging. Over a decade of teaching experience through 'Learn With ElAmir.'

projects.title: Code Academy Platform
projects.description: Interactive coding platform with live code execution, progress tracking, and peer review.

projects.title: Tech Tutorial Series
projects.description: A library of deep-dive technical tutorials covering system design and architecture patterns.

planets.name: NLP Research
planets.description: Natural Language Processing research focused on mental health applications. Using transformer models and linguistic analysis to detect early signs of depression from text data.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis Engine
projects.description: Real-time sentiment classifier for social media streams with multilingual support.
projects.architecture:
graph TD
A[Text Input] --> B[Tokenizer]
B --> C[BERT Encoder]
C --> D[Attention Layers]
D --> E[Classification Head]
E --> F[Sentiment Score]

projects.title: Document Summarizer
projects.description: Abstractive summarization tool for long-form documents using fine-tuned language models.

planets.name: Scrum & PM
planets.description: Agile project management and team leadership. Shipping products on time without burning out the team.

projects.title: Agile Transformation
projects.description: Led a 40-person engineering org through a waterfall-to-agile transition over 6 months.

projects.title: Product Roadmap Tool
projects.description: Internal tool for visual roadmap planning with dependency tracking and capacity forecasting.
projects.architecture:
graph TD
A[Roadmap UI] --> B[D3.js Renderer]
A --> C[API Layer]
C --> D[PostgreSQL]
C --> E[Auth Service]
D --> F[Dependency Graph]
